name: Super Toaster X: Learn Japanese RPG
description: A dungeon crawling RPG to learn Japanese vocabulary.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 500 MHz CPU Memory: 200 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 750 MHz CPU Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card Storage: 500 MB available space
